## Stack

## JavaScript Rules
- No inline scripts
- Use `addEventListener`
- Cache reused DOM selectors

## Design System Rules
- Use CSS variables
- No arbitrary hardcoded values
- Maintain spacing & typography scale

## Responsive Rules
- Mobile-first
- Respect 480px / 768px breakpoints
- Prevent layout overflow

## Accessibility

- Keyboard navigation
- Proper ARIA where required
